channel.title: computation on J. Jiang
channel.description: Recent content in computation on J. Jiang

item.title: Computational Geophysics
item.description: Extracting important and relevant physics from data and developing models with predictive power will be a significant task in the future of Earth sciences. Many of my observation-oriented projects share the theme of utilizing a probabilistic inference framework (analytical and numerical Bayesian approaches) with an emphasis on characterizing uncertainty in data and modeling, and propagating that uncertainty to inferred/predicted parameters. The other part of my research involves developing computational models with sophisticated physics and predictive powers to understand earthquakes, tsunamis, or slow slip.
